name: Aqua League
description:
Aqua League

Aqua League is a low-stakes underwater sports game. Try to hit the ball into the opponent's net! Play alongside your AI buddy (red) to defeat the mean-spirited blue team.

Controls
  • W to move forward
  • A and D to rotate
  • Space to 'lock on'
Dev Notes

Hello, thanks for checking out the game. I am not sure exactly where this project will go next, but I will rank some features in order of how badly I need/want to add them:

  1. Scoreboard, winning/losing
  2. Menus, options, match settings
  3. Local Multiplayer
  4. Controller Support
  5. Networked Multiplayer
  6. Alternate maps/modes

Let me know what you think!
